ygData.subject: Re: Trouble in the lab
ygData.msgSnippet: Razor Claw left his feat and his shield dissapaited, he again hit the wall with a thud. What weapon is this? His confusion was matched only by his inability

Razor Claw left his feat and his shield dissapaited, he again hit the 
wall with a thud. "What weapon is this?" His confusion was matched 
only by his inability to move.

Lunarpine knew that she couldn't keep this up forever so he decided 
to end the fight. He charged forward and put his claws to the 
Raptor. "You can let him go now, he's not going anywhere."

Razorclaw was pinned and without his feat to ground him he couldn't 
activate his shield. "Ganging up on me? I thought Maximals fought 
fair." he stared at Lunarpine hoping for the chance to escape.

"To bad we aint your average maximal." Lunarpine stared right back at 
him, The Raptor knew he wasn't kidding and looked away. "You win, I'm 
your prisoner." The Predacon thought he was a POW, he didn't know 
that Veratis wasn't part of the war.

Veratis stepped forward, "Let him down Lunarpine, He's not 
responsible for his actions." Lunarpine let go and stepped aside. "I 
think I have some explaining to do." He started his origin speech and 
Razor Claw listened.

(Did I send you information on Veratis, Foxfingers, and Lady Hawk 
yet?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She entered into Razar Claw's mind and saw him put up his shields. 
> She still could use her abilities against him. She changed into 
> griffen mode without realizing it. She concentrated and pushed him 
> against the wall with her mind.  She would hold him there and not 
let 
> him go. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > (His robot arms are his beast legs, His shoulders flip around to 
> > become his thighs resulting in the catapult jump he used.)
> > 
> > Razor Claw put up an invisible shield to protect himself from her 
> > pecks. He remained still, waiting to see what Ice did next.
> > 
> > Lunarpine saw the break in the action and took advantage. He 
> > transformed to his half wolf stage and dashed into the battle. 
> > Foxfingers rolled out and began scampering toward Lunarpine. 
> > Lunarpine grabbed the fox and pulled him to safety.
> > 
> > Veratis watched as the stalemate continued. The virus seemed to 
> have 
> > given Razor Claw extra abilities too. He catalogued each movement 
> and 
> > each technique. Both were changed thanks to him, and both were 
> deadly.
> >
